name: Jax Varro
core_wound: Born with genetic modifications he never chose, treated as subhuman his entire life, believes he's inherently lesser
wants: To escape the undercity, to be seen as equal, to be free
needs: To accept himself and realize the system is wrong, not him
voice_markers: Noir detective style narration in internal thoughts
Uses undercity slang mixed with surprising vocabulary from stolen books
contradiction: Believes the caste system is unjust but has internalized that he's inferior, wants freedom but scared of what he'd do with it
physical_description: Mixed race (Black and Asian), stocky build from Gamma modifications, stronger than he looks, scarred knuckles, tired eyes, moves like someone expecting violence, by his 40s looks weathered and haunted
skills: Reading people - knows when to run
Undercity navigation - knows every tunnel and blind spot
Basic hand-to-hand combat from street fights
flaws: Drift addiction throughout trilogy, gets worse under stress
Internalized oppression - believes he deserves his treatment
Trust issues - assumes everyone will betray him
knowledge_state_book1_start: Nothing about upper castes except what he's seen from below

relationships.Elara Quinn: Alpha caste investigator who infiltrates, becomes love interest - forbidden and dangerous relationship
relationships.Finn: Best friend and fellow dealer, undercity family
relationships.The Collector: Mysterious fence who buys the Earth currency, connection to upper world
relationships.Station Authority: They see him as non-person, he sees them as oppressors
